parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description:
The namespace to evaluate the check.

Note: If you use the Expand API and the check
evaluates a RelationTuple specifying a SubjectSet as
subject or due to a rewrite rule in a namespace config
this check request may involve other namespaces automatically.

parameters.name: object
parameters.description: The related object in this check.

parameters.name: relation
parameters.description: The relation between the Object and the Subject.

parameters.name: subject.id
parameters.description: A concrete id of the subject.

parameters.name: subject.set.namespace
parameters.description:
The namespace of the object and relation
referenced in this subject set.

parameters.name: subject.set.object
parameters.description: The object selected by the subjects.

parameters.name: subject.set.relation
parameters.description: The relation to the object by the subjects.

allowed.description:
Whether the specified subject is
related to the requested object.

It is false by default if no ACL matches.

v1alpha1CheckResponse.description: The response for a CheckService.Check rpc.

id.description: A concrete id of the subject.

set.description:
A subject set that expands to more Subjects
(used for inheritance).

v1alpha1Subject.description:
Subject is either a concrete subject id or
a subject set expanding to more Subjects.

namespace.description:
The namespace of the object and relation
referenced in this subject set.

object.description: The object selected by the subjects.

relation.description: The relation to the object by the subjects.

v1alpha1SubjectSet.description:
SubjectSet refers to all subjects which have
the same `relation` to an `object`.
It is also used for inheritance.
